Module JTrashFX
Package application.model.mazzo

Class Mazzo

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
application.model.mazzo.Mazzo
public class Mazzo extends Observable
Class which represent the deck used to play the game

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Mazzo getInstance()
      getter of the instance, the instance will not be created if null, to work the deck has to be initialize trough the classic constructor. This method is just a simple getter
      Returns:
      the static instance of Mazzo

    • setMazzo

      public static Mazzo setMazzo(int numOfNpc)
      This method set the deck used to play the session
      Parameters:
      numOfNpc - is the number of npc choose to play, needed to know how big construct the deck

    • setMain

      public void setMain(ArrayList<Carta> mazzo)
      Setter of the main deck with the deck given as parameter
      Parameters:
      mazzo - deck used to set the main

    • stamp

      @Deprecated public void stamp()
      Deprecated.
      Method used to do some development checks, it stamps the entire deck stamping every single card

    • distributeCards

      public void distributeCards(ArrayList<Player> players)
      The distributeCards method is the starting phase of the game, in this phase the players get the card for their starting hand and set the TrashStatus on false
      Parameters:
      players - is the array of player to which distribute cards

    • checkContain

      private boolean checkContain(int[] indexMixed, int rand)
      Private Method used to mix the deck.

      Precisely it check that the position of a card (r) is not already added in the new mixed deck.

      Parameters:
      indexMixed - the list of position of the card already added
      rand - the position of the card to add
      Returns:
      true if the card has already got mix, false instead

    • getMano

      public Carta[] getMano(int n)
      Generate one list of Carta object containing n cards to have be given to the player
      Parameters:
      n - the number of cards the player must get
      Returns:
      the hand (array of Carta)

    • mix

      public void mix(ArrayList<Carta> deckToMix)
      Method used to mix an arrayList of cards 5 times, reset the pointer, set this arrayList as the main deck, and clear the discard pile

      Precisely it generate a Random number who represent the position of the card to switch with current card of the iteration, switch them and add the position of the card mixed to the array of number of position Mixed. The method use the check() function to be sure to pick a random number different from a previous one to get a more accurate mix

      Parameters:
      deckToMix - is the deck to mix and set as main

    • useDiscardPile

      public void useDiscardPile(boolean mainHasNext)
      Method used only when there isn't a next card: to mix the discard pile 5 times, set it as main deck, clear the discard pile array and reset the pointer
      Parameters:
      mainHasNext - is a boolean to indicate if there is an next card on the main deck

    • getLastDiscard

      public Carta getLastDiscard()
      Method to get the last discarded card
      Returns:
      the card at the top of the discard stack

    • getRimanenti

      public int getRimanenti()
      Method to check if there are other available cards in the main deck
      Returns:
      the number of remaining cards

    • hasNext

      public boolean hasNext()
      Method to know if there is an next element
      Returns:
      true if there a next element

    • next

      public Carta next()
      Method to get a card from the deck
      Returns:
      the next card

    • discard

      public void discard(Carta c)
      add to the discard pile the card given as parameter
      Parameters:
      c - Card to discard
